section.p:
The Repository Explorer displays a file tree view of repository with file-type icons corresponding to those used by VS .NET for a valid URL and revision. It can display any revision in the repository, given as head, as specific date or a revision number. The head revision is the latest revision present in the repository. If Date is selected in the dropdown the date-picker is enabled and a calendar is available.
How to use the Repository Explorer:
Open the Repository Explorer. It is found under VS View menu.
1. Type in the full path to a repository.
2. Select a revision (Head, Date or type in a revision number manualy).
3. Select a date if you have selected 'Date' in the the revision field (2.).
4. Select 'Go' to.
5. Here you will se all the files in the selected repository.
